doc.title: Columbia World of Sports: Billiard and Bowling Champs
doc.plot: This Columbia World of Sports short (production number 5808) utilizes a slow motion camera while Billiards expert Willie Hoppe demostrates several cushion shots. Bowler Joey Falcaro throws a few strikes on the bowling lanes and picks up some hard spares, while Willie Mosconi fills the pool table pockets with ball after ball after ball after...
